participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

tbi_1_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], has your child been hospitalized or treated in an emergency room following an injury to their head or neck? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_1b_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbi_1c_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_2_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], has your child injured their head or neck in a car accident or from crashing some other moving vehicle like a bicycle, motorcyle, or ATV? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_2b_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbi_2c_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_3_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], has your child injured their head or neck in a fall or from being hit by something? (For example, falling from a bike or horse, rollerblading, falling on ice, being hit by a rock). In the past year, has your child injured their head or neck playing sports or on the playground? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_3b_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbi_3c_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_4_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], has your child injured their head or neck in a fight, from being hit by something, or from being shaken violently? In the past year, has your child been shot in the head? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_4b_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbi_4c_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_5_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], has your child been nearby when an explosion or blast has occurred? Desde la última vez que nos vimos en [asnt_timestamp_c], ¿ha estado su niño/a cerca de una explosión o un estallido? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_5b_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbi_5c_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_6o_l.Description: Do you want to report any more injuries with loss of consciousness since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c]? Desde la última vez que nos vimos en [baseline_year_1_arm_1][asnt_timestamp] ¿quisiera reportar otras lesiones que hayan resultado en la pérdida de conocimiento ? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_6p_l.Description: If yes, how many more? ¿Si la respuesta fue sí, cuantas más?

tbi_6q_l.Description: How many minutes was the longest knock out? ¿Cuántos minutos duró el tiempo más largo que estuvo inconsciente?

tbi_6r_l.Description: How many were more than or equal to 30 min? ¿Cuántas veces ha estado inconsciente por ≥ 30 min o más?

tbi_6s_l.Description: What was their youngest age? ¿A qué edad fue la primera vez que estuvo inconsciente?

tbi_7a_l.Description: Since we last saw you on [asnt_timestamp_c], did your child experience a period of time when they experienced multiple, repeated impacts to the head? (e.g., abused, contact sports)?  | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_7c1_l.Description: Was your child knocked out or did they lose consciousness (LOC)? If yes, how long? | 0 = No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento; 1 = < 30min < 30min; 2 = 30min-24hrs 30min-24hrs; 3 = >24 hrs >24 hrs

Levels.0: No LOC Sin pérdida de conocimiento

tbl_7c2_l.Description: Was your child dazed or did they have a gap in their memory from the injury? | 1 = Yes Si; 0 = No No

tbi_7e_l.Description: At what age did these effects begin? ¿A qué edad comenzaron estos efectos?

tbi_7f_l.Description: At what age did these effects end? ¿A qué edad terminaron estos efectos?

tbi_8b.Description: Thinking about the most serious concussion your child experienced since we last saw on you [asnt_timestamp_c], approximately how many days of school did your child miss, if any, due to the effects of the concussion? | [tbi_8] = '2' OR [tbi_8] = '3' OR [tbi_8] = '4'

tbi_8a.Description: Approximately how many days of school did your child miss, if any, due to the effects of the concussion?  | [tbi_8] = '1'

tbi_8.Description: The next question asks about concussions. A concussion is when a blow or jolt to the head causes problems such as headaches, dizziness, being dazed or confused, difficulty remembering or concentrating, vomiting, blurred vision, or being knocked out. Since we last saw on you [asnt_timestamp_c], how many times did your child have a concussion from playing a sport or being physically active? | 0=0 times ; 1=1 time ; 2=2 times ; 3=3 times ; 4=4 or more times [event-name] = '4_year_follow_up_y_arm_1'
